name: Down
desc: This unit cannot counterattack for one round of combat.

name: Fear
desc: <violet>Cognitive. </>Can't attack or counterattack. +15 AVO.

name: Confused
desc: <violet>Cognitive. </>Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

name: Charmed
desc: <violet>Cognitive. </>Unit has been seduced by the enemy, lowering their STR/MAG/DEF/RES by 5.

name: Enraged
desc: <violet>Cognitive. </>Unit will charge at and only attack the unit that angered them.

name: Enraged
desc: <violet>Cognitive. </>Unit will charge at and only attack the unit that angered them.

name: Toxin
desc: <brown>Biological. </>-2 to all combat stats except LCK. Can stack up to 5 times.

name: Poisoned
desc: <brown>Biological. </>Unit takes 5 damage at the start of every turn.

name: Silenced
desc: <brown>Biological. </>Unit cannot use any skills.

name: Enervation
desc: <brown>Biological. </>-10 STR/SPD.

name: Bomb
desc: <brown>Biological. </>Unit will explode after taking damage, instantly killing them and dealing 10 damage to enemies within 2 spaces.

name: Omertà
desc: This unit is immune to <violet>cognitive</> ailments.

name: Devil Luck
desc:
Skill gained by equipping the Devil Axe.
Receives damage equal to damage dealt.

name: Eclipse Helper
desc:
In order for enemies to use Eclipse, they must think they're inflicting a negative status or dealing damage.
Eclipse doesn't deal damage normally, so instead it secretly inflicts this status.
